1.0.name: wordpress/activecampaign-form
1.0.description:
The ActiveCampaign Form Plugin by ContactUs.com serves dynamic newsletter signup forms for ActiveCampaign users to build their email newsletter list.

The ActiveCampaign Form Plugin by ContactUs.com publishes newsletter signup forms, chosen from a library of beautifully-designed templates, which have a seamless integration with an ActiveCampaign account. This signup form can be used by businesses and websites who are ActiveCampaign users to add new email subscribers from their WordPress website. The plugin is designed for WordPress websites seeking a simple, effective online newsletter signup form from which to grow their newsletter list.

ActiveCampaign http://www.activecampaign.com is email marketing software used by over 100,000 small businesses. It provides tools to businesses to build an email marketing list, manage contacts, send email campaigns and track campaign performance. ActiveCampaign subscribers
